ctu_text: ", "answer": "For RPL types 1 and 2 to be conducted in camps and in employer premises, respectively, applying organizations will need to register on an online RFP portal. All applications will be received will be evaluated and after approval by a competent authority at NSDC, the successful applicant will be informed. After the allocation of targets, applicant can train in candidates proposed centers only after setting up a training facility in RPL camps (type 1) or employer premises (type 2) that has a classroom, laboratory, equipment and infrastructure as required/specified by the SSC for RPL orientation, bridge course (if applicable) and assessment, for that job role. Please note, the last date for submitting application via RFO was 19 June 2021.
